comments.raw_text:
Shorlander pointed out that dialogs on modern Windows (> XP?) have buttons which are right-aligned instead of centered.

See: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa511267.aspx

[There's also the blue-text and darker button-region, not sure if we want to address that while we're here.]

This should be easily fixable with a tweak to dialog.xml and/or some CSS.

Ehsan: I'm assuming that these are actually left-aligned for a RTL locale Windows?
